text: Përlepnicë Lake (, / Jezero Prilepnica) is a small lake situated in western Kosovo, surrounded by the Goljak mountains. Prilepnica Lake is found just north-east of the city of Gjilan, also it supplies water for the city. A tributary of the South Morava flows through the lake and it is the largest lake in the east of Kosovo. == References == Category:Lakes of Kosovo
title: Përlepnicë Lake
